name: Blight Of Avarice
description:
Submitted for Weekly Game Jam 27.

Explore a dark cave with nothing but a few torches, searching for ancient treasure.  What could be rotting at the very bottom?

Code and art by blockgun

Music, sound effects (and a bit of art) by Rainbowbleh

UPDATE 1/21/2018: Fixed a LOT of bugs, balanced gameplay better, and added an Easter egg referencing YourBr0ther
